Package net.xqhs.util.logging

Class UnitExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xqhs.util.config.Config
      • net.xqhs.util.logging.Unit
        • net.xqhs.util.logging.UnitExt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable
    public class UnitExt
extends Unit
    This class extends Unit in order to provide all functionality required by the LoggerClassic interface.

    The class does not implement the interface, as that would require for the methods to be public, but to policy of Unit is to have logging methods protected.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
